title: Robert W USES R&G Brenner Middle Village location
text: Linda, Ann ant Thomas Nuss are incredible. I can honestly say I enjoy the experience every year. I can not ask for anything more. I recommend Thomas and the entire team to everyone that I speak to about tax preperation. I look forward to seeing them next year. The entire team displays professionalism, knowledge and pleasantness. I have been going to R&G Brenner for nine years now.
